00040 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00041 {
00042     const char* sysdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT;
00043     const char* userdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_USER_DICT;
00044     int decompOpt = 0;
00045 
00046     for(int optIndex=1; optIndex+1<argc; optIndex+=2)
00047     {
00048         if(! strcmp(argv[optIndex], "--user"))
00049             userdict = argv[optIndex+1];
00050         else if(! strcmp(argv[optIndex], "--decomp"))
00051             decompOpt = atoi(argv[optIndex+1]);
00052         else if(! strcmp(argv[optIndex], "--dict"))
00053             sysdict = argv[optIndex+1];
00054         else
00055         {
00056             cerr << "unknown option: " << argv[optIndex] << endl;
00057             printUsage();
00058             exit(1);
00059         }
00060     }
00061 
00062     cout << "system dictionary: " << sysdict << endl;
00063     cout << "user dictionary: " << userdict << endl;
00064 
00065     // create factory
00066     JMA_Factory* factory = JMA_Factory::instance();
00067 
00068     // create analyzer and knowledge
00069     Analyzer* analyzer = factory->createAnalyzer();
00070     Knowledge* knowledge = factory->createKnowledge();
00071 
00072     // load dictioanry files
00073     knowledge->setSystemDict(sysdict);
00074     // get encoding type from user dict file name such as "xxx.eucjp"
00075     string str = userdict;
00076     string encodeStr = str.substr(str.find_last_of(".")+1);
00077     cout << "encoding type of user dictionary: " << encodeStr << endl;
00078     knowledge->addUserDict(userdict, Knowledge::decodeEncodeType(encodeStr.c_str()));
00079     if(knowledge->loadDict() == 0)
00080     {
00081         cerr << "error: fail to load dictionary files" << endl;
00082         exit(1);
00083     }
00084     cout << "encoding type of system dictionary: " << Knowledge::encodeStr(knowledge->getEncodeType()) << endl;
00085 
00086     // set knowledge
00087     if(analyzer->setKnowledge(knowledge) == 0)
00088     {
00089         cerr << "fail to set knowledge" << endl;
00090         exit(1);
00091     }
00092 
00093     // decompose user defined compound into nouns
00094     analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_DECOMPOSE_USER_NOUN, decompOpt);
00095 
00096     Sentence s;
00097     string line;
00098     while(getline(cin, line))
00099     {
00100         s.setString(line.c_str());
00101 
00102         if(analyzer->runWithSentence(s) != 1)
00103         {
00104             cerr << "error: fail in Analyzer::runWithSentence()" << endl;
00105             exit(1);
00106         }
00107 
00108         // get one-best result
00109         int i= s.getOneBestIndex();
00110         if(i == -1)
00111             cout << "no one-best result exists." << endl;
00112         else
00113         {
00114             for(int j=0; j<s.getCount(i); ++j)
00115                 cout << s.getLexicon(i, j) << "(" << s.getBaseForm(i, j) << "," << s.getReadForm(i, j) << "," << s.getNormForm(i, j) << ")/" << s.getStrPOS(i, j) << "  ";
00116 
00117             cout << endl;
00118         }
00119     }
00120 
00121     delete knowledge;
00122     delete analyzer;
00123 
00124     return 0;
